text: Kandi (yewe Muhamadi) ubabarire by’ukuri inkuru y’abana babiri ba Adamu (Gahini na Abeli), ubwo bombi batangaga ibitambo; icy’umwe muri bo (Abeli) kikakirwa ariko icy’undi (Gahini) nticyakirwe. (Gahini) aravuga ati “Rwose ndakwica.” (Abeli) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri, Allah yakira (ibikorwa) by’abamutinya”
